pages.title: Warden
pages.text: Level: <level_t4>$(br2)When a $(key)Sculk Shrieker$() is triggered by $(bold)vibrations$() at least $(bold)4$() times, the $(key)Warden$() will emerge from the ground.$(br2)Defeating the $(key)Warden$() drops a $(key)Heart of the Deep$(), which is used to open the $(key)Otherside$().

pages.title: Otherside
pages.text: $(copy:Ancient City)Ancient City$()[$(copy:minecraft:ancient_city)minecraft:ancient_city$()] lies deep underground in the $(bold)Overworld$().$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)In the center of an $(key)Ancient City$() there is a $(key)portal$() made of $(key)Reinforced Deepslate$(). After $(bold)clearing$() the $(key)Sculk Veins$() attached to it, $(bold)right-click$() the $(bold)portal frame$() with a $(key)Heart of the Deep$() to activate the $(key)portal$(). Going through it will take you to the $(key)$(t:also known as the Deep Dark dimension)Otherside$().
